name: Beach Dare Terror
description:
Your Friend dared you to run down the World's most Dangerous Beach. You accepted the dare because you were young and stupid.

This game was made for the Low Tier Jam #2

How to play:

This is a endless runner. Use the right arrow to go right, and vice versa.

Sorry this game is not polished at all. I would like to release a bunch of unpolished games to get started with game dev, and then polish them as I go along.
